andromeda.why: Initial hunger/limitation is self-calibration, not rescue.

arcturus.why: Sets the constraint and pace—choose one seed, contain the start.

draco.why: Pressure can flip into gatekeeping around ‘real’ beginnings.

lyra.why: Names the story-seed so the experience can form.

orion-dark.why: Grabbing rules to force a start rather than align it.

orion-light.why: Discipline to hold to one path under urge and lack.

pleiades.why: Self-soothing keeps the start humane and sustainable.

sirius.why: No transmission yet—this is inner setup.

andromeda.why: Chooses freely which desire to pursue; declines the rest.

arcturus.why: Places the beginning in right timing and scope.

draco.why: Sentinel against distractions and predatory hype.

lyra.why: Frames the fantasy into a clear initiating narrative.

orion-light.why: Courage to commit to a modest, clean first step.

pleiades.why: Attuned support calms nerves at the threshold.

sirius.why: Skilled choosing, not yet protocol teaching.

andromeda.why: Novelty-seeking outsources agency to ‘the next thing.’

draco.why: Status tests and access-gating around ‘real experiences.’

orion-dark.why: Doctrine of ‘always start’ used as compliance.

orion-light.why: Lesson: reduce scope and refine timing.

andromeda.why: Frees energy by limiting to one storyline.

arcturus.why: Designs the start protocol—sequence, budget, review.

draco.why: Gates scope; protects from opportunists and scope creep.

lyra.why: Curates the initiating image that guides action.

orion-dark.why: Process can ossify into ritualized beginnings.

pleiades.why: Supportive hosting steadies the group at kickoff.

sirius.why: Teaches seeding protocol by example—how to begin cleanly.

andromeda.why: Ends FOMO coercion; initiates only what preserves freedom.

arcturus.why: Sets standards for beginnings—criteria, pace, and safeguards.

draco.why: Enforces fair thresholds; no intimidation starts.

lyra.why: Turns the start into a coherent cultural story.

orion-light.why: Integrity under pressure—initiate or delay by truth.

pleiades.why: Mentoring warmth makes the new cycle receivable.

andromeda.why: Embodied freedom to begin or refrain—choice beyond hunger.

arcturus.why: Establishes enduring canon for initiating cycles.

draco.why: Presence can read as rank gate to ‘real beginnings.’

lyra.why: Archetypal story-seed—few words ignite a culture.

orion-dark.why: Canon of ‘how to start’ risks law-over-life control.

orion-light.why: Role-model courage to time the start by integrity.

sirius.why: Royal instruction: the canon of beginnings transmitted by presence/protocol.
